foreignData.name: Vertrauter Rabe
foreignData.text:
Fliegend; Echo
Schaue Dir die obersten drei Karten Deiner Bibliothek an, wenn der Vertraute Rabe ins Spiel kommt. Nimm eine davon auf Deine Hand und lege die anderen in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter Deine Bibliothek.

mainBoard.name: Raven Familiar
mainBoard.text:
Flying
Echo {2}{U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Raven Familiar enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

mainBoard.flavorText: It's tastiest when served with the fish it stole.

foreignData.name: Ausdorren
foreignData.text: Wähle eines -Ausdorren fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu; oder Ausdorren fügt einer blauen Kreatur Deiner Wahl 4 Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Parch

rulings.text: You choose the mode when you announce the spell.
You can choose to use the 2 damage mode on a blue creature if you want.

mainBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Parch deals 2 damage to any target.
• Parch deals 4 damage to target blue creature.

mainBoard.flavorText: Rainclouds don't last long in Shiv, but that doesn't stop the lightning.

foreignData.name: Lichtbogen
foreignData.text: Der Lichtbogen fügt 3 Schadenspunkte zu, die Du beliebig auf Kreaturen und/oder Spieler Deiner Wahl verteilen kannst.

mainBoard.name: Arc Lightning

rulings.text: You choose how many targets Arc Lightning has and how the damage is divided as you cast the spell. Each target must receive at least 1 damage.

If some of the creatures are illegal targets as Arc Lightning tries to resolve, the original division of damage still applies but no damage is dealt to the illegal targets. If all targets are illegal, Arc Lightning doesn’t resolve.

mainBoard.text: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

mainBoard.flavorText: The war cry is not simply a shout but a sacrament.

foreignData.name: Schlachtruf der Ghitu
foreignData.text: {R}: Eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl erhält +1/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

mainBoard.name: Ghitu War Cry
mainBoard.text: {R}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack, but when to stop.

foreignData.name: Trompetenstoß
foreignData.text: Angreifende Kreaturen erhalten +2/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

mainBoard.name: Trumpet Blast

rulings.text: An “attacking creature” is one that has been declared as an attacker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield attacking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be an attacking creature through the end of combat step, even if the player it was attacking has left the game, or the planeswalker it was attacking has left combat.
Even though Trumpet Blast affects only attacking creatures, the bonus will remain for the rest of the turn.
Only creatures that are attacking as Trumpet Blast resolves will receive the bonus. In other words, casting it before you’ve declared attackers usually won’t do anything.

mainBoard.text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: When Gatha fell, he was called to account for each abomination he created.

foreignData.name: Ätherstich
foreignData.text: Immer wenn einer Deiner Gegner einen Kreaturenzauber spielt, fügt der Ätherstich diesem Spieler 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

mainBoard.name: Aether Sting

rulings.text: The ability triggers when an opponent casts a creature spell, and goes on the stack above that spell. As such, the ability will deal 1 damage to that player before the creature enters the battlefield.

mainBoard.text: Whenever an opponent casts a creature spell, Aether Sting deals 1 damage to that player.

mainBoard.flavorText: The pungent smell of roasting flesh made both mages realize they'd rather break for dinner than fight.

foreignData.name: Gezackter Blitz
foreignData.text: Der Gezackte Blitz fügt einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu und einer anderen Kreatur Deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Jagged Lightning
mainBoard.text: Jagged Lightning deals 3 damage to each of two target creatures.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Stop thinking like an artificer, Urza, and start thinking like a father!"
—Rayne, Academy Chancellor

foreignData.name: Urzas Brutkasten

Kreaturenzauber des bestimmten Typs kosten 2 weniger zum Ausspielen.

mainBoard.name: Urza's Incubator

rulings.text: You choose a creature type right as it enters the battlefield, before any continuous effects are applied or trigged abilities trigger.

mainBoard.text:
As Urza's Incubator enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creature spells of the chosen type cost {2} less to cast.
